page.title: 11Foxlease Guide Training
page.content: Guides from all over the world come to Foxlease to train and take part in various activities such as:Physical Fitness, Enjoyment of the outdoors, Homecraft skills, First Aid, Readiness and ability to serve others and Creative ability. Also in the 63 acres of land, guides can learn to camp and become independent. All the activities are done over the weekend or a week. Parties are also held here . This year, 1985, Foxlease is celebrating 75 years of Guiding and many special events have been organised, such as a carnival where over 10 000 Guides and Brownies attended. At this event the house was open to the public.
